title: Mathieu van der Poel, Jasper Philipsen Poised for Double Trouble Sprint Repeat at Tour de France
content:
The most dangerous duo returns to the Tour, with eyes on green and dominance in the sprints: 'It will be difficult to repeat everything we did last year.'

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel, Jasper Philipsen Poised for Double Trouble Sprint Repeat at Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
